text: Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.

It's critical in relationship management to have all of one's emails captured in HubSpot. There are ways using Microsoft outlooks plug-in to connect emails to a HubSpot contact organization. However, you have to make that connection every email you send. There's also a way to do a BCC of an email address to have a spot to capture the email. Has anyone come up with a way to ensure that by contact all email conversations are tracked?
